name: Fudey - Sensory Calligraphy
description: You can master proper brush strokes while your brush produces sound. Shifting from traditional calligraphy learned by sight to calligraphy experienced through sound and sensation. Variations in brush pressure create beautiful changes in tone, while brush speed is vividly visualized as a heat map. In a 3D space, brush movements are reproduced three-dimensionally, allowing observation from any angle. Highly recommended for those who find calligraphy challenging. Experience the authentic feel of a brush with Apple Pencil through this innovative calligraphy application.
